welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tamarac, where the charm of our vibrant community and beautiful parks awaits you. Known for our friendly locals and rich cultural scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for low-cost carriers such as Southwest Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as Delta and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and Emirates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a new login every 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi access is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Public Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal building at MIA, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal serving various airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: A concourse within the Central Terminal, primarily used by international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
